name: MMORPG.com Remove Background
description: This removes the background image(ad) from mmorpg.com.

user.name: ir0nfist
user.about: I sometimes put up fixes for annoyances I find in websites I use.  Just so others don't have to take the time to do it.  That's about it.

additional_info:
I may in the future remove all the excess stuff from the page, but if you want to smooth it out yourself, I'd suggest using Remove It Permanently addon in firefox.  Can't comment on chrome since I don't use it.

*thumbs up*
